commenter_b: I have been doing some serious thinking on this. I have always been pro second amendment, but maybe it is time to take a look at this from another direction. I propose we start here and see how this new gun control thing works. I propose that all people convicted of felonies be banned from owning/possessing firearms. All convicted felons should be made to turn in the guns the legally own now. Once we have all of those, lets move to people convicted of misdemeanor crimes of violence, like assault, sexual battery and so on. Lets get all those criminals that currently legally owning guns to turn those in. I figure it will take a year or so for all these people to disarm and turn in their guns and then we can see if we are having a positive impact on violent gun crimes. If so, then we can ...

post_message: "We wanted to point out that while he seems to think he can say what he likes in one place and not hear about it elsewhere, he is wrong," said one Scottish protester, referring to Trump's controversial comments about Mexican immigrants. point of the flag is to show solidarity with the Mexicans and every other group that Trump has decried, derided, insulted and tried to marginalize, said David Milne, a member of the Tripping Up Trump campaign.
